name: A Long Walk (heise-kun, TeXx, CinderTwist, toronado, soserio)
name_original: A Long Walk (heise-kun, TeXx, CinderTwist, toronado, soserio)
description:
A Long Walk is a cute 3D platformer, made in a handful of weeks in a homegrown engine, by a group of game dev students!

Stretch your little robot legs to reach new heights, help your friends and explore a colorful landscape.

Basic mechanics:

Stretch/Jump

Pickup/Throw

Controls can be found in the Setting menu in-game. Gamepad support.

Hope you have as much fun playing the game as we had making it! Enjoy!!
